lines.text: let n , m , a , b = long long
lines.code: long long n , m , a , b ;

lines.text: whilte reading new values for n , m , a , and b , print min ( ( m - n modulo m ) * a , n modulo m * b )
lines.code: while ( cin >> n >> m >> a >> b ) { cout << min ( ( m - n % m ) * a , n % m * b ) << endl ; }
